About

Nandre

My passion and hobyy is designing and writing computer programs. I also like to play CTFs and boxes from sites like CTFtime and Hack The Box. My co-hobby is composing music, for a multitude of genres, including: film, game, synthwave.

I made this site to share some of my thoughts and projects that I hope people can learn from. The majority of my projects are open-source. You can check them on my Github

Languages I know:

Romanian, Python, English, C++
